column1: Shawnee has a council–manager government.  Mayor and councilmembers are elected to four year terms.  Each ward has two representatives whose terms are staggered by two years.  However
column2: the elections of April 2010 and 2012 will serve for three years.  The day-to-day operations are managed by the city manager.
